item.description:
ChatGPT’s ETH Analysis has reported Ethereum’s rise to $4,410, a +4.36% surge leaving it 9% from its ATH. Backed by $1.01B ETF inflows, robust EMAs, and institutional positioning, ETH shows strong bullish momentum amid potential for either an ATH breakthrough or healthy overbought correction.

item.title: Seoul’s Gangnam District Targets Tax Evaders in Revamped Crypto Confiscation Drive
item.description:

item.title: Do Kwon Pleads Guilty to Fraud, Accepts 12-Year Sentence & $19M Fine – Is Justice Served for Terra Investors?
item.description:
Do Kwon has acknowledged guilt in a federal fraud case over the collapse of TerraUSD. The Terraform Labs co-founder entered the plea in New York, with prosecutors suggesting a 12-year sentence and over $19 million in penalties ahead of a December 11 sentencing date.
